Mein Name ist Philipp Kopp und ich bin e: My name is Philipp Kopp, and I'm a passionate videographer with a strong focus on aesthetics and visual storytelling. For a decade, I've had the pleasure of working with companies, talented musicians, and inspiring artists. My journey has taken me from the enchanting landscapes of the Odenwald to international stages and projects. My strength lies in not only capturing moments but also capturing emotions in every frame and sequence. Every project is an opportunity for me to capture the uniqueness and beauty in moving images. Our creative partnership allows us to create synergies that elevate your projects to the next level.
Ich bin Stéphane Kamwa, Hochzeitsfotogra: My name is Stéphane Kamwa, and I am a wedding photographer and videographer.
Vor 13 Jahren bin ich nach Deutschland g: I came to Germany 13 years ago to pursue my studies. It was at the beginning of my Media Informatics degree at the University of Applied Sciences Mittelhessen that I discovered photography and videography. This profession allowed me to finance my studies in Germany.
Mit 10 Jahren Erfahrung in der Hochzeits: With 10 years of experience in wedding photography and videography, I am passionate about capturing life’s most precious moments. I love telling the story of your day through beautiful moving images. My films and photos are the perfect way to relive the most special day of your life – a unique memory you will never forget.
Wenn euch ein authentischer Stil, echte: If you appreciate an authentic style, genuine emotions, and natural poses, I look forward to your inquiry and the opportunity to tell your personal story.
Nach dem Ende meines Studiums konnte ich: After finishing my studies, I couldn’t stay long in a conventional job because I missed the feeling of making people happy through my work. I believe becoming a wedding photographer and videographer wasn’t a conscious decision – it was destiny that led me here. And you know what? I wouldn’t change a thing. I consider myself the happiest person in the world because I get to do the job I fell in love with.
Schaut euch gerne mein Portfolio an und: Feel free to explore my portfolio and discover my world.
Hochzeitsfotograf & Hochzeitsvideograf i: Wedding Photographer and Videographer in Darmstadt | Wedding Reportage Worldwide
Nach vielen Jahren, in denen ich mich in: After many years of working in the wedding industry, I wanted to take things a step further. That’s why I decided to bring together the best wedding service providers on this platform.
Wie man auf den Bildern sehen kann, ist: As you can see in the pictures, spending a day with me is a breeze. I’m someone full of joy and positive energy, always seeing the bright side of life. I do my best to pass on that joy to all my clients. The atmosphere during the photo sessions is very relaxed – we laugh a lot and simply enjoy the moment.

Wir warten darauf, eure Liebe zu feiern: We can't wait to celebrate your love.
Um dieses Ziel zu erreichen, führen wir: To achieve this goal, we begin with an initial meeting to get to know each other. After that, I will provide you with a personalized offer tailored to your wishes, ideas, and budget. I deeply value the honor and trust you place in me to step into the intimacy of your special day and capture its most meaningful and emotional moments.
Können wir dich vor unserer Hochzeit ken: Can we get to know you before the wedding?
Bevor ihr euch für mich entscheidet, kön: Before you decide to book me, we can absolutely talk on the phone or have a video call. If you're based in the Rhine-Main area and things are safe again, I’d love to meet up for a coffee before the wedding. We can discuss the most important questions about your wedding coverage by phone in advance.
Bearbeitest du die Bilder unserer Hochze: Do you edit the photos from our wedding?
Alle Fotos euer Hochzeitsreportage werde: Yes, all the photos from your wedding reportage are individually edited and given a final polish in my signature style. I also create a black-and-white selection so you get a nice variety. If you later want any of the black-and-white images in color as well, just let me know.
Greifst du in den Tag ein ?: Do you interfere with the flow of the day?
Ich greife nicht in den Ablauf ein, sond: No, I don’t interfere with the schedule. I capture your wedding as it is – authentic, natural, and unique. I document your day and your love just the way you are, without staging or interrupting the moments.
Wieviele Bilder bekommen wir ?: How many photos will we receive?
Ich habe keine festgelegte Bilderanzahl,: I don’t limit the number of photos delivered. You’ll receive all the good shots – without getting 10 versions of the same image. As a general guideline, you can expect around 50–60 edited photos per hour of coverage.
Müssen wir für die Hochzeitsreportage po: Do we have to pose for our wedding photos?
An eurer Hochzeit gilt: Ihr müsst euch w: On your wedding day, the most important thing is that you feel comfortable! There’s no need for stiff poses or disappearing from your celebration for hours. We’ll fit the couple session smoothly into your day’s timeline. As a wedding photographer, I know how to make you feel at ease while shooting – that’s how we create authentic, natural, and beautiful photos.
Was kostet eine Hochzeitsreportage ?: How much does a wedding reportage cost?
Es kommt darauf an, wie viele Stunden ih: For videos, it’s best to reach out to Ilyas from Not Your Uncle Videography! We work as a team, and it works really well – not just because we’ve been “married for a hundred years,” but because our styles complement each other perfectly. Be sure to check out his website!
Können wir dich nur im Rhein-Main-Gebiet: Can we only book you in the Rhine-Main area?
Ich arbeite nicht nur in Darmstadt, Fran: I don’t just work in Darmstadt, Frankfurt, Mainz and the surrounding area – I’m available all over Germany as a wedding photographer. I also travel abroad for wedding reportages. Just send me a message for more details on travel costs.
Was passiert bei schlechtem Wetter ?: What happens if the weather is bad?
Auch bei Regen können schöne Fotos entst: Beautiful photos can still be taken in the rain! If your wedding day gets literally rained out, I’ll still be there and make sure the weather doesn’t show in your photos. I also offer a free after-wedding shoot when the weather is better. If you’ve booked a couple or portrait session, I’ll gladly offer you a new date free of charge upon request.
Wie lange dauert es, bis wir die fertige: How long does it take to receive our wedding photos and video?
Die Nachbearbeitung ist für mich immer e: Editing is always a very creative process for me, as I aim to craft each story in a unique way. Typically, you’ll receive your photos within 2 to 4 weeks, and the video within 4 to 8 weeks.

Wir haben Stephane für unsere Hochzeit b: We booked Stephane for our wedding a year in advance. On the day itself, he was very friendly and captured everything important. He delivered the finished results just two days after the wedding, which was incredibly fast. We are very happy with the finished images and very glad that he photographed us. Thank you so much ♥️♥️♥️
Stephane begleitete meinen 40. Geburtsta: Stephane accompanied me to my 40th birthday party with 60 people at a restaurant. The contact was quick, reliable, and professional. Stephane is a very personable photographer who stays discreetly in the background and captures the guests perfectly. In three hours, he took almost 750 images, which I received edited just seven days later. I'm very happy with the results and would book Stephane again anytime.
Stephane accompanied our company summer: Stephane accompanied our company summer party and we are completely thrilled with his professional work and his story-telling pictures. We can highly recommend Stephane and will work with him again anytime. During the whole time he was in the background and captured all moments and emotions authentically. Stephane is also a very friendly person. We had a lot of fun with him and enjoyed having him with us on our day. Absolutely recommended!
Certainement la meilleure expérience ave: Definitely the best experience with a photographer to date. Stéphane is by far the friendliest and most talented photographer. He made sure my family was comfortable and enjoyed the experience. I am so glad I came across Stephane (Theplug). Stéphane is very professional and the quality of his work is breathtaking. Wir präsentieren euch unsere professione: We present our professional wedding photography services, which aim to capture the unforgettable moments of your special day in beautiful images. With a creative and trained eye, we capture the emotions, beauty, and unique details that make your wedding so special. Whether romantic portraits or spontaneous moments, our photos tell your story with style and elegance. Trust in our experience and passion to capture the memories of your most beautiful day for eternity.
Wir bieten euch einzigartige Foto- und V: We offer unique photography and video services for your wedding day, capturing all the special moments you want to cherish forever. Our team ensures that you can fully concentrate on celebrating your big day, while we capture the magic in professional images and emotional videos in the background. With attention to detail and an eye for authentic moments, we create your wedding story in a unique style that reflects your personality. Let's create unforgettable memories together that will last a lifetime.
Wir bieten euch unvergessliche Hochzeits: We offer unforgettable wedding videos that capture your unique moments forever. With our passion for film and a creative eye, we create emotional and authentic videos that put your love story at the center. From the small details to the big moments – we capture everything so you can relive these special moments again and again. Our goal is to capture your wedding as it truly was: full of emotion, joy, and love. Let's immortalize your most beautiful day together in a film that will stay with you for a lifetime!
Hier bekommt ihr das komplette Material,: Here you will receive all the footage I filmed at your wedding separately. I will organize it chronologically, meaning all unusable, shaky, or duplicate recordings will be removed, and the sound will be optimized (e.g., the camera audio will be replaced with higher-quality recordings from lavalier and speech microphones - without background music)
Wenn ihr den \"FOMO\"-Edit dazubucht, ha: If you book the "FOMO" Edit, you will also have a long video that you can watch at home for special occasions to relive your entire wedding day. You can rewatch many small scenes, such as hugs from guests at the champagne reception, etc., that didn't make it into the highlight video or the wedding film.

Generally, travel costs are exclusive. For hotel/accommodation & travel costs we charge a flat rate that is determined individually for each wedding. This depends on whether, for example, accommodation is provided by the couple or a rental car, etc.
Wie läuft die Buchung ab ?: How does the booking process work?
Gerade in den Sommermonaten sind die Ter: Especially during the summer months, dates are often quickly booked. I only film one wedding per day, so there's only one couple who can book me. When making an inquiry, the date is not yet reserved. Only when you have signed the booking contract and made the down payment is the date firmly reserved for you.
Wir empfehlen es jedem Brautpaar das Pak: We recommend every couple choose the package where we're present from getting ready to the wedding dance. Of course, this decision is up to you. For me, however, it's important to film your entire wedding day story. A tip from me here is - if possible - to schedule your wedding later. You don't have to book the overtime hours directly - you can decide this later or even on the wedding day.
Das Paket kann auch ohne weitere Zusatzo: The package can also be booked without additional options. Due to the high demand for additional options, which are often realized after the wedding, here is a clear price list for further possibilities.
